questions.question: What does the T stand for in TEEVL?
This is a topic sentence: This is seen through Gardo's devoted friendship with Raphael and Jun-Jun.
This is a topic sentence: Mulligan explores, through the dumpsite boys, the importance of helping those in need.
What do the two Es stand for in TEEVL?
What is the order of the structure in a body paragraph?
What do you include in the evidence part?

choices.answer: State a moral or message from the text
Briefly describe a moment and use quotes
Describe a character and use quotes

questions.question: What do you do in the explain part?

choices.answer: Explain how the character undertook that action
Explain how your evidence supports your topic sentence/key argument
Explain the plot of the novel
Explain why your TLC teacher is amazing

questions.question: What do you do in the Views/Values part?

choices.answer: Explain the moral or message the author is teaching us
Explain your view of the novel and plot
Explain the value and importance of a character
Explain the importance of a moment in the novel

questions.question: Is this an example of a Views/Values: Mulligan demonstrates that lived experiences are more valuable than money.
What do you include in the final sentence of your body paragraph?

choices.answer: Link - write a sentence that links my idea to the plot
Link - write a sentence that links my idea to the contention
Link - write a sentence that links my idea to a theme
Link - write a sentence that links my idea to the author
